name: ALevelSequenceActor
doc: Actor responsible for controlling a specific level sequence in the world.

BindingOverrides: Mapping of actors to override the sequence bindings with
DefaultInstanceData: Instance data that can be used to dynamically control sequence evaluation at runtime
bReplicatePlayback: If true, playback of this level sequence on the server will be synchronized across other clients
bOverrideInstanceData: Enable specification of dynamic instance data to be supplied to the sequence during playback

methods.name: AddBinding
AddBindingByTag
FindNamedBinding
methods.doc: Retrieve the first object binding that has been tagged with the specified name

methods.name: FindNamedBindings
GetSequence
GetSequencePlayer
methods.doc: Access this actor's sequence player, or None if it is not yet initialized

methods.name: RemoveBinding
methods.doc: Removes the specified actor from the specified binding's actor array

methods.name: RemoveBindingByTag
methods.doc: Removes the specified actor from the specified binding's actor array

methods.name: ResetBinding
methods.doc: Resets the specified binding back to the defaults defined by the Level Sequence asset

methods.name: ResetBindings
methods.doc: Resets all overridden bindings back to the defaults defined by the Level Sequence asset

methods.name: SetBinding
SetBindingByTag
SetReplicatePlayback
methods.doc: Set whether or not to replicate playback for this actor

methods.name: SetSequence
